issue.title: [C++] The merged generator can sometimes pull from source sync-reentrant
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13417](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13417). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Async generators make no promises about whether or not they are synchronously reentrant and they should never be pulled in a synchronously reentrant fashion.  The merged generator is breaking this rule.
